thread.title: Seattle workers picket aviation contractor over labor issues
thread.title_full: Seattle workers picket aviation contractor over labor issues

title: Seattle workers picket aviation contractor over labor issues
text:
Tip : Use comma (,) to separate multiple quotes. Learn more... 
Fri, Sep 11, 2015, 17:29 BST - UK Markets closed Seattle workers picket aviation contractor over labor issues Workers at Sea-Tac airport hold strike against aviation contractor over labor, safety concerns Associated Press – 27 minutes ago Print 
SEATAC, Wash. (AP) -- Baggage handlers, cabin cleaners and ramp workers employed by Alaska Airlines contractor Menzies Aviation have walked off the job at Sea-Tac International Airport. 
The workers are picketing on Friday to protest what they say is unfair labor practices_including intimidation, threats, and harassment— by their employer. 
The Menzies Aviation workers also say they're also demanding a safe workplace. 
The workers plan to picket all day Friday and hold a 10 a.m. rally where they'll be joined by community leaders. 
The workers are asking the public to send a message to Alaska Airlines to tell their contractor to respect the law. 
Messages left with Menzies Aviation seeking comment were not immediately returned. Follow the quotes you care about most. Access timely news and investment updates to stay on top of the market. … More » Yahoo UK & Ireland Finance Terms
